Articles.Content:
I would like to take some smiling face photo. And it seems that the EVA Kerbalnaunt just...show me the poker face. Anyway to make him smile? Like what he did in the Command Pod or Cockpit?

Edited November 7, 2013 by Sirine
I (think) that depending on their stupidity/bravery they will smile more/less. You just have to wait until they start smiling. Stupid kerbals smile more often.
Take them to the Mun. They always grin like madmen once you get 'em safely on the surface.

^Indeed, on the surface of any celestial body they'll smile. especially if they jump to test the gravity, or lack thereof.

Or you could make them float about in Orbit, but that may yeild a frown from the one's who aren't as brave.
Put them On a Surface Of a other Planet And You Will get Kerbals Grinning Even though they were told there not gonna return
